idea: Viviid Renewable Private Limited is incorporated to be an active start up company to incubate the entities in the Green energy and Clean Development Management field and provide the clean energy solutions
name: VIVIID RENEWABLES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Kosodum welfare private limited is a registered company in the state of Maharashtra, India. This organization is extensively focused on spreading awareness about tribal arts, cultures & traditional knowledge across the India.

 We create an online platform to facilitate the selling of books written by tribal authors.

 Provide platforms to Indian tribal artist for their employment.

 Create awareness of tribal knowledge with regards to tradition, customs, languages, tribal traditional medicine and other related topics, tribal arts like painting, handy crafts, artifacts, jewelry, musical instruments, toys or any art which is related to Indian tribal art.
name: KOSODUM WELFARE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: To carry on the business of clearing and forwarding agents, courier and cargo handlers, handling and haulage contractors, ware housemen, common carriers by land, rail, water and air, container agents, to handle goods within the country and outside and to establish, organize, manage, run, charter, conduct, contract, develop, handle, own, operate and to do business as fleet carriers & transporters for transporting goods, articles or things on all routes and lines on National and International level through all sorts of carriers like trucks, lorries, trawlers, dumpers, coaches, tankers, tractors, haulers, jeeps, trailers, motor buses, omnibuses, motor taxis, railways, tramways, aircraft, ships, vessels, boats, barges and any other vehicle of likewise nature whether by own arrangements or through representatives, agents or business affiliates and to do all incidental acts and things necessary for attainment of these objects either through e-commerce, e-mail, instant messaging, online storefronts, and shopping carts or any other means.
name: ASKY PARCELS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
https://www.unlimit.co.in/

To develop and support IoT in the best possible way for the Indian market, Reliance Group forayed in the business with an independent unit – Unlimit IoT Private Limited in 2016. Unlimit is one of the pioneers of IoT business in India, driven by an in-depth knowledge of the Indian market and an unparalleled end-to-end IoT offering ranging from managed connectivity to device management and application software to any form of analytics.
name: UNLIMIT IOT PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Appstrail is a new age consulting firm which helps businesses grow, innovate, transform and become a customer centric company. 

We leverage only the best technology platforms to help realise this goals for our customers. We have selected Salesforce as our technology partner to deliver consulting and implementation services to customers by focusing on solutions for select industry vertical. Our road map is to build repeatable assets to speed up implementation process for all our customers and help realise their goals not in months but weeks. Our product (focused to help sales executive achieve their quotas faster) would be listed on the worlds largest b2b marketplace. Additionally, a few of the these assets would be published on this marketplace (free & paid) to generate traction, lead flow and more business.
name: APPSTRAIL TECHNOLOGY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Organizing the unorganized retail space through technology
name: c mart

idea: Our Company Trutech Webs Private Limited is fastest growing Information Technology Company, We are pioneer in the field of Artificial Intelligence solutions which are presently used by renowned Banks worldwide viz Bank of America, JNCB, Royal Bank of Canada, any many more, also we are having tie-ups with many OEM’s in India, Mauritius, UAE, Europe, and USA & Europe. We have been awarded by President of India for our contribution in the field of Information technology and also we are the recipient of many National and International awards for excellence in the field of Information technology.
name: TRUTECH WEBS PRIVATE LIMITED
